FunctionalRequirements.Name: Voice Command Interaction
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to perform actions and navigate the interface using voice commands, simplifying interactions for users like Elena who may feel overwhelmed by technology.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Personalized Medication Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide personalized medication reminders through voice prompts, allowing users to confirm medication intake and receive wellness check-ins tailored to their preferences.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Cognitive Engagement Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall enable users to set daily reminders for cognitive exercises, with the option to customize the frequency and type of activities based on their preferences and cognitive abilities.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Event Participation Assistance
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall assist users in accessing virtual community events by providing step-by-step guidance, ensuring users can connect with minimal technical barriers.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: User Interface Simplicity
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall ensure that the user interface is simple and intuitive, catering to users with varying technical abilities to enhance overall usability and reduce feelings of overwhelm.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Data Privacy Assurance
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall implement robust privacy controls to ensure that users' health data is protected and that users feel secure in sharing their information with the platform.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: System Reliability
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall demonstrate high reliability, ensuring that reminders, notifications, and functionalities are consistently available to users without failures.
